about.problemDesc: When stake pools retire, delegators stop earning rewards. Many wallets remain unknowingly delegated to retired pools, resulting in millions of ADA in lost potential rewards.
about.solutionDesc: ADAHealth provides a transparent platform where anyone can check the status of their delegated pool. We use only public blockchain data to provide an independent source of truth.
about.independentDesc: We are not affiliated with any stake pool operator or Cardano organization. Our data comes directly from the blockchain.
